name: Pizza Spy
description:
After centuries of oblivion, a mysterious organization emerges from the past: its secret agents call themselves Pizza Spies!

Pizza Spies operate at a higher level than government agents and maintain total anonymity thanks to the use of biodegradable weapons and devices that cannot be detected by normal security checks. This makes Pizza Spies lethal and free to act in any circumstances, above all other jurisdictions.

Their purpose? Protecting the world’s balance from any gastronomic dangers…

Secret agent Ace Cook will reluctantly be recruited to complete a very delicate mission: stopping the terrible "El Cocinero." This is the code name of a criminal Chef Saucier who, by carrying out a series of culinary attacks around the world, intends to become the greatest chef of all time…




From the makers of the noir-comedy adventure “Detective Gallo” comes an action-comedy adventure that parodies the spy genre by putting you in the shoes of the secret agent Ace Cook!

Decide to act in Covert (stealth) or Overt (direct) Mode, solving problems in different ways and overcoming specific game sequences according to your style!



Complete missions to acquire powerful Pizza Gadgets with which you’ll unlock new ways of interacting with the scenarios!

Explore a game world with over 40 locations that can be fully visited by riding in the Pizza Way, the hi-tech vehicle Ace is equipped with!

Test your moral code by making narrative choices that will influence the course of events!

Replayable adventure with multiple endings!

Fully hand-drawn and animated cartoon-style exploration and action sequences!

Original soundtrack and full English voice-overs (with Italian and German subtitles)!
